title: Cl + O3 mechanism - overall rate law

content.description: When free Cl(g) atoms encounter O3(g) molecules in the upper atmosphere, the following reaction mechanism is proposed to occur.
content.question: Which of the following rate laws for the overall reaction corresponds to the proposed mechanism?

skill.text: 4.D: Explain the degree to which a model or representation describes the connection between particulate-level properties and macroscopic properties.
